nodes.text: Ploo IV was a planet in the Ploo sector of the Expansion Region.
The planet's surface consisted mostly of vast oceans, marshlands, and floating cities that were connected by vast tubes that were situated beneath the surface of the water.
The natives of Ploo IV, the Fluggrians, were constantly at war with the Glymphids, inhabitants of the nearby planet of Ploo II.
The podracer Kam Nale was from Ploo IV. He raced in the Boonta Eve Classic.
